en: My car is a used one.
My car is large enough to carry five people.
zh: 我的车够大，能坐五个人。

en: My car is under repair.
My car is now being repaired.
My car needs repairing.
My car is at your disposal.
My car is being fixed now.
My car is not running.
Although my car is very old, it still runs very well.
zh: 虽然我的车很旧，但开起来还挺顺的。

en: My car won't start.
My car is a Toyota.
Mine is an apology for a car.
Where is my car?
There's something the matter with my car.
There is something wrong with my car.
My car is German.
My car is parked not far from here.
zh: 我的车停在离这儿不远的地方。

en: My car is on its last legs.
My car is equipped with a CD player.
My car needs washing.
My car, which broke down yesterday, has not been repaired yet.
zh: 我的车昨天坏了，还没修好呢。

en: It was careless of you to lose my car key.
zh: 你太粗心了，把我的车钥匙给弄丢了。

en: I wish I knew what is wrong with my car.
zh: 我真想知道我的车到底怎么了。

en: I couldn't meet him at the station because my car ran out of gas.
zh: 因为我的车没油了，我没能去车站接他。

en: Something is wrong with the engine of my car.
zh: 我的车发动机出故障了。

en: Let's go for a ride in my car.
zh: 咱们开我的车去兜风吧。

en: I'll send you home in my car.
I found my car missing.
He had the kindness to lend me his car when mine broke down.
zh: 我车坏的时候，他好心地把车借给我用。

en: Answer me.
Answer my questions.
She made no response to my question.
Please answer my question.
There was no response to my question.
My dictionary is very useful.
My car is being repaired.
Something has happened to my car.
You can use my bicycle.
My bicycle needs fixing.
My bicycle is in need of repair.
My bicycle disappeared into thin air.
zh: 我的自行车莫名其妙地不见了。

en: My bicycle has gone out of commission.
My bicycle has got a flat tire.
Riding my bicycle, the boy ran into a big rock.
zh: 那个男孩骑着我的自行车撞上了一块大石头。

en: Keep your hands off my bicycle.
Don't touch my bike.
When my bicycle hit the rock, the front tire blew out.
zh: 我的自行车撞上石头时，前胎爆了。

en: My home phone number is, area code two-oh-one, one-two-three, four-five-six-seven.
My watch is waterproof.
My watch gains five minutes a day.
My clock is two minutes fast.
My watch isn't running right.
My watch is accurate.
My watch loses three minutes a week.
zh: 我的表一个星期慢三分钟。

en: My watch needs repairing.
My watch needs to be repaired.
My watch is not correct.
It occurred to me that my watch might be broken.
zh: 我突然想到，我的表可能是坏了。

en: My watch gains thirty seconds a month.
zh: 我的表一个月快三十秒。

en: My watch is more accurate than yours.
My watch is broken.
My watch may be one or two minutes fast.
zh: 我的表可能快了一两分钟。

en: My watch loses five minutes a day.
My watch is very accurate.
My watch gains one minute a day.
My watch is running all right.
My watch is less expensive than yours.
My watch is different from yours.
My watch gains five seconds a day.
My watch loses two minutes a day.
It is ten o'clock by my watch.
It is just nine by my watch.
It's four o'clock by my watch.
My watch has been stolen.
That was because my watch was five minutes slow.
zh: 那是因为我的表慢了五分钟。

en: My time has not yet come.
My time is running out.
A pet theory of mine is that things should be seen from a distance.
zh: 我个人的一个看法是，看事情眼光要放长远点。

en: Please leave my things alone.
Let my things alone.
Leave my stuff alone.
Leave my things alone.
My office is on the fifth floor.
My office is in the central area of the city.
My office is on the fourth floor of that gray six-story building.
zh: 我的办公室在那栋六层灰色建筑的四层。

en: My office faces Fifth Avenue.
zh: 我的办公室对着第五大道。

en: My business has at last gotten on the right track.
zh: 我的生意终于走上正轨了。

en: Please don't go out of your way on my account.
If you don't believe me, go and see for yourself.
zh: 你要是不信，就自己去看看。

en: Don't meddle in my affairs.
One of my teeth hurts.
From my point of view, Australia is one of the best countries in the world.
zh: 在我看来，澳大利亚是世界上最好的国家之一。

en: I change my mind a lot.
The population of my city is about two-thirds as large as that of this city.
zh: 我那个城市的人口大约是这个城市的三分之二。

en: My children wear out their shoes quickly.
My children really like animals.
zh: 我家孩子特别喜欢动物。

en: My child dislikes the dentist.
My child is curious to know everything.
zh: 我家孩子对什么都很好奇。

en: See that my children behave well at school.
zh: 帮我盯着点孩子，让他们在学校表现好点。

en: Please keep your eye on my child.
zh: 请帮我照看下我的孩子。

en: When he saw me, he ran away.
Let me introduce my sister.
My sister is not a good cook, and neither am I.
zh: 我姐姐做饭不好吃，我也一样。

en: My sister isn't a good cook, and neither am I.
zh: 我姐姐做饭不好吃，我也一样。

en: My sister plays the piano every day.
My sister plays piano every day.
My sister takes a shower every morning.
zh: 我姐姐每天早上都洗澡。

en: My older sister takes a shower every morning.
zh: 我姐姐每天早上都洗澡。

en: My sister showers every morning.
zh: 我姐姐每天早上都洗澡。

en: My sister has her hair done each week.
zh: 我姐姐每周都去做头发。

en: My sister usually walks to school.
zh: 我姐姐平时走着去上学。

en: It is said that my sister is beautiful.
zh: 听说我姐姐长得很漂亮。

en: My sister is engaged to him.
My sister became a college student.
My sister will have been studying English for ten years when she graduates from her college.
zh: 我姐姐大学毕业的时候，就学了十年英语了。

en: My sister goes to a university.
My sister is a good swimmer.
My sister likes classical music no less than I do.
zh: 我姐姐跟我一样喜欢古典音乐。

en: My sister is very fond of children.
My sister is not a high school student.
My sister isn't a high school student.
My sister married her high school classmate.
zh: 我姐姐跟她的高中同学结婚了。

en: My sister is married.
My sister is shorter than you.
My sister likes sweets.
My sister has a sweet tooth.
My sister sings songs very well.
My older sister is good at singing.
My sister is afraid of all doctors.
My sister used to take care of the flower bed.
zh: 我姐姐以前经常打理花坛。

en: My sister often takes care of the baby.
zh: 我姐姐经常照顾小宝宝。

en: My sister often looks after the baby.
zh: 我姐姐经常照顾小宝宝。

en: My sister likes melons and so do I.
zh: 我姐姐喜欢吃瓜，我也一样。

en: My sister has a piano.
My sister has a very good brain.
My sister is very intelligent.
Both of my sisters are married.
zh: 我的两个姐姐都结婚了。

en: My sister is in her twenties.
Could you find a room for my sister?
zh: 能给我姐姐找个房间吗？

en: Both of my sisters are not married.
zh: 我的两个姐姐都没结婚。

en: In my beginning is my end.
zh: 我的起点就是我的终点。

en: My mission is to photograph the documents.
zh: 我的任务就是把这些文件拍下来。

en: You can use whichever pen I'm not using.
zh: 哪支笔我没在用，你就可以用哪支。

en: Please give me a hand with my job.
Can you help me with my work?
Are you willing to help me with that work?
zh: 你愿意帮我做那个工作吗？

en: Don't hinder me in my work.
My work is to wash my father's car.
zh: 我的工作就是给我爸洗车。

en: I work as a museum attendant.
My work is almost finished.
My job is taking care of the baby.
My job is to take care of the baby.
My job is taking care of our baby.
It's my job to take care of the baby.
Taking care of the baby is my job.
My work is finished.
My job is to wash dishes.
My job is teaching English.
My work is not complete yet.
My work isn't complete yet.
zh: 我手头的活儿还没做完。

en: My work was to deliver pizza by motorcycle.
zh: 我以前是骑摩托车送披萨的。

en: My work is always feast or famine.
zh: 我这活儿总是忙的时候忙死，闲的时候闲死。

en: My day ends at 5 o'clock.
I need some help with my work.
zh: 我工作上需要点儿帮忙。

en: I deal in facts and figures, not vague impressions.
zh: 我讲究的是事实和数据，不是模糊的感觉。

en: I will help you when I have finished my work.
In my job I have to deal with all kinds of people.
zh: 我这工作得和各种各样的人打交道。

en: Won't you share my umbrella?
Come under my umbrella, or you'll get wet.
zh: 过来一起打伞吧，不然该淋湿了。

en: My dish-washing duties are a heavy burden.
zh: 洗碗这活儿真是个累赘。

en: I had my composition corrected by the teacher.
Will you please look over my composition?
Please find me my wallet.
My crime seems unreal to me.
zh: 我总觉得我犯的罪不真实。

en: Let me introduce my wife.
zh: 我介绍一下，这是我老婆。

en: My wife is anything but a good cook.
zh: 我老婆做饭一点儿都不好吃。

en: My wife showed excellent taste in decorating the room.
zh: 我老婆布置房间很有品位。

en: My wife usually doesn't drink coffee at night, and neither do I.
zh: 我老婆晚上一般不喝咖啡，我也一样。

en: My wife is Chinese.
My wife talked me into buying a new car.
zh: 我老婆说服我买了辆新车。

en: My wife told me to do away with this old hat.
zh: 我老婆让我把这顶旧帽子给扔了。

en: My wife told me to throw this old hat away.
zh: 我老婆让我把这顶旧帽子扔掉。

en: My wife likes to eat out, so she doesn't have to cook.
zh: 我老婆喜欢在外面吃，这样她就不用做饭了。

en: My wife is a poor driver.
zh: 我老婆开车技术不太行。

en: My wife took good care of this dog.
zh: 我老婆把这只狗照顾得很好。

en: My wife really hates cats.
My wife did not attend the party and neither did I.
zh: 我老婆没去参加派对，我也没去。

en: My wife was a Smith.
My wife wants me to do away with this nice old hat.
zh: 我老婆想让我把这顶不错的旧帽子扔了。

en: My wife is always finding fault with me.
When using the kitchen knife, my wife cut her finger.
zh: 我老婆用菜刀的时候把手给切了。

en: My wife's taste in dress is contrary to my own.
zh: 我老婆的穿衣品位跟我完全反着来。

en: There is milk all over the kitchen floor because my wife broke the bottle.
zh: 厨房地上全是牛奶，因为我老婆把瓶子打碎了。

en: My first task was to screen out unqualified applicants.
zh: 我的第一项任务是刷掉那些不合格的申请人。

en: My worst vice is smoking.
zh: 我最大的坏习惯就是抽烟。

en: My left arm is asleep.
I owe what I am to you.
I owe what I am today to you.
zh: 我今天能有这样全靠你。

en: I owe what I am to your assistance.
zh: 我能有今天全靠你的帮忙。

en: My country is far away from Japan.
The food in my country is not very different from that of Spain.
zh: 我国家的菜跟西班牙的没什么区别。

en: My behavior was very odd.
zh: 我那会儿的表现挺奇怪的。

en: I am not accountable to you for my actions.
zh: 我没必要为我的行为向你交代。

en: I'm not accountable to you for my conduct.
zh: 我不需要为我的言行向你解释。

en: Do it the way I told you to.
Let me say what I think.
My thoughts are in agreement with them.
zh: 我的想法跟他们是一致的。

en: My idea went against his.
zh: 我的想法跟他的完全相反。

en: My idea differs from his.
zh: 我的想法跟他不太一样。

en: My idea is different from yours.
My ideas are different from yours.
My idea is quite different from yours.
zh: 我的想法跟你大不相同。

en: You should try the exam again.
zh: 你应该再去考一次试试。

en: In my view you should try the exam again.
zh: 我觉得你应该再去考一次。

en: To my mind, the worst part of air travel is the hanging around in airport lounges.
zh: 在我看来，坐飞机最受罪的部分就是在机场休息室干等着。

en: In my opinion, he is wrong.
In my opinion, we need to diversify our assets.
zh: 我认为我们需要把资产多元化。

en: In my opinion, permanent peace is nothing but illusion.
zh: 在我看来，永久和平不过是个幻想。

en: To my thinking, business is improving.
In my view, you are wrong.
To my mind, it was his mistake.
To my way of thinking, that was his mistake.
I think that it was his mistake.
That isn't a good idea in my opinion.
zh: 我觉得那个主意不怎么样。

en: I think this politics means Serbs, Croats, and Muslims.
zh: 我认为这里的政治指的是塞尔维亚人、克罗地亚人和穆斯林。

en: In my opinion, you should take the exam again.
zh: 我觉得你应该再考一次。

en: In my opinion, you are wrong.
Add a little more milk to my tea, please.
zh: 麻烦给我的茶里多加点奶。

en: My happiness depends on you.
I have a predilection for beef.
My taste is quite normal.
My favorite song is Hungry Spider.
One of my favorite songs is Hungry Spider.
My favourite game is football.
zh: 我最喜欢的运动是足球。

en: My favorite singer is THE ALFEE.
zh: 我最喜欢的歌手是 THE ALFEE。

en: One of my favorite tunes was playing on the radio.
zh: 收音机里正播着一首我特别喜欢的曲子。

en: My favorite team is Inter Milano in Italy.
zh: 我最喜欢的球队是意大利的国际米兰。

en: My favorite sport is skiing.
zh: 我最喜欢的运动是滑雪。

en: My favorite sport is soccer.
zh: 我最喜欢的运动是足球。

en: Tennis, my favorite sport, has brought me a lot of friends.
zh: 网球是我最喜欢的运动，它让我交到了很多朋友。

en: Please point out my mistake.
My favorite soccer player is Shinji Ono.
zh: 我最喜欢的足球运动员是小野伸二。

en: My mistake incurred his anger.
My sponsor was willing to agree to my suggestion.
zh: 我的赞助人愿意接受我的建议。

en: Please follow me.
Please read after me.
Repeat after me.
Please repeat after me.
Repeat each sentence after me.
zh: 跟着我一句一句地复述。

en: Come along after me.
I heard a noise behind me.
My hometown is in the center of Kobe.
My home lies far across the sea.
zh: 我家在遥远的大海另一边。

en: My home town lies 10 miles south of New York.
zh: 我家乡在纽约以南10英里的地方。

en: Don't stick your nose into my personal affairs.
Don't take my words ill.
My remarks were not aimed at you.
I didn't aim my remarks at you.
I'm sorry if my words hurt you.
zh: 如果我的话伤到了你，我很抱歉。

en: I am sorry if my words hurt you.
zh: 要是我的话伤到了你，对不起。

en: My words provoked her to anger.
My words angered her.
It never occurred to me that my words would hurt her feelings.
zh: 我压根没想过我的话会伤到她。

en: I find it difficult to express my meaning in words.
zh: 我觉得很难用语言表达我的意思。

en: If you were really interested in what I'm saying you wouldn't be staring out of the window.
zh: 如果你真的对我说的感兴趣，就不会一直盯着窗外看了。

en: You see what I mean?
You understand what I mean, don't you?
You understand what I'm saying, don't you?
zh: 你知道我在说什么，对吧？

en: Do I make myself clear?
Am I making sense?
As you treat me, so I will treat you.
zh: 你怎么对我，我就怎么对你。

en: Don't forget what I told you.
What I said hurt his pride.
zh: 我说的话伤了他的自尊。

en: Would you like to add anything to what I've said?
zh: 对于我说的这些，你还有什么想补充的吗？

en: The time will come when you will understand what I mean.
zh: 总有一天你会明白我的意思。

en: You can't go wrong if you are advised by me.
You will do exactly as I say.
zh: 你得完全按照我说的做。

en: I'm right, aren't I?
Listen to me carefully.
Listen to me very carefully.
zh: 认真听我接下来说的话。

en: Please listen to me.
I mean it.
What I'm saying is true.
I'm telling you the truth.
Do you see what I mean?
Do you understand what I mean?
Listen to me.
Listen to me, will you?
Nobody believed what I said.
Listen to me carefully, and you will understand what I really mean.
zh: 仔细听我说，你就会明白我到底是什么意思了。

en: Please answer me.
Correct me if I am mistaken.
zh: 如果我说错了，请纠正我。

en: Correct me if I'm wrong.
zh: 要是我说得不对，你就指出来。

en: This is all I have to say.
Hear what I have to say.
Let me make plain what I mean.
My point is a broader one.
What I want to say is this.
From my point of view, it would be better to wait a little longer.
zh: 在我看来，最好再多等一会儿。

en: My bet is that John will get the job.
zh: 我敢打赌，约翰会得到那份工作。

en: My point of view is contrary to yours.
I see great possibility in him.
As I see it, that is the best way.
zh: 在我看来，那是最好的办法。

en: In my estimation, he is an honest man.
zh: 我觉得他这人挺老实的。

en: I had a notion to tell what I had seen.
zh: 我当时想把我看到的都说出来。

en: Patting me on the shoulder, he thanked me for helping him.
zh: 他拍了拍我的肩膀，感谢我帮了他。

en: My dogs are white.
Don't worry about my dog. He won't do you any harm.
zh: 别担心我的狗，它不会伤人的。

en: I found my dog lying under the tree in our yard.
zh: 我发现我的狗躺在院子里的树底下。

en: My dog is white.
My dog lapped the water thirstily.
zh: 我的狗渴得一直舔水喝。

en: My dog goes to its house.
My dog goes everywhere with me.
zh: 我的狗我去哪儿它都跟着。

en: My dog was taken care of by Lucy.
My dog often pretends to be asleep.
My dog often lies on the grass.
zh: 我的狗经常躺在草地上。

en: My dog was run over by a truck. He was not killed, but his foot was badly injured.
zh: 我的狗被卡车撞了，没死，但脚伤得很重。

en: My dog follows me wherever I go.
zh: 不管我走到哪儿，我的狗都跟着我。

en: My dog has a long tail.
My dog is almost half the size of yours.
zh: 我的狗差不多只有你那只的一半大。

en: Don't worry about my dog.
My dog and cat live in harmony with each other.
zh: 我的猫和狗相处得很和谐。

en: My dog is wagging his tail.
My health is none the better for my exercise.
zh: 我锻炼了身体也没见好转。

en: My health is not equal to the voyage.
zh: 我的身体吃不消这次航行。

en: My monthly wage is 300,000 yen.
My monthly salary is 300,000 yen.
zh: 我一个月的工资是30万日元。

en: My conjunctivitis is chronic.
What will you give me at my wedding?
zh: 我结婚的时候你打算送我什么？

en: I cannot stand you telling me all the time what my faults are.
zh: 我受不了你老是数落我的缺点。

en: My plan failed time after time.
zh: 我的计划一次又一次地失败了。

en: My plans failed one after the other.
zh: 我的计划一个接一个地失败了。

en: My plan is to buy a car.
Will you go over my plan?
zh: 你能帮我过一遍我的计划吗？

en: My plan is different from yours.
My plan was rejected.
My plan is visiting old castles in Scotland.
zh: 我的计划是去苏格兰参观古堡。

en: My plan is to study in Australia.
zh: 我的计划是去澳大利亚留学。

en: My plan is to finish writing all the letters today.
zh: 我打算今天把信全写完。

en: Are you against my plan?
You must accommodate your plans to mine.
Please don't interfere with my plan.
I would appreciate it if you could agree to my plan.
zh: 如果你能同意我的计划，我会很感激的。

en: According to my experience, it takes one year to master French grammar.
zh: 凭我的经验，掌握法语语法得花一年。

en: As far as my experience goes, such a plan is impossible.
zh: 就我的经验来看，这种计划是不可能的。

en: Words cannot describe the horror I felt.
zh: 我感到的那种恐惧简直无法用语言形容。

en: From my own experience, illness often comes from sleeplessness.
zh: 照我的经验，生病往往是缺觉引起的。

en: My brother works in a bank.
One of my brothers is a teacher and the others are lawyers.
zh: 我有一个兄弟是老师，其他的都是律师。

en: My brother is arriving tomorrow morning.
My brother is not busy.
My brother isn't busy.
My older brother isn't busy.
My brother went to the United States to study law.
My brother pretended to be working very hard.
zh: 我哥装出一副很努力工作的样子。

en: My brother goes to college in Tokyo.
My brother lives in Tokyo.
My brother had his pocket picked in the train.
zh: 我哥在火车上被偷了钱包。

en: My elder brother is an authority on philosophy.
zh: 我哥是哲学方面的权威。

en: My older brother is an authority on philosophy.
My brother's an authority on philosophy.
My brother is good at mathematics.
My brother is a college student.
My elder brother finished his homework very quickly.
zh: 我哥很快就把作业写完了。

en: My older brother finished his homework very quickly.
My big brother finished his homework very quickly.
My brother is holding a camera in his hand.
My brother can drive a car.
My brother is rich enough to buy a car.
My brother is out of work.
My brother was very pleased with the examination result.
zh: 我哥对考试成绩很满意。

en: My brother failed to pass the examination.
My brother eats twice as much as I do.
zh: 我哥的饭量是我的两倍。

en: My brother loves taking pictures of mountains.
My brother was killed in a traffic accident.
My brother was injured in the car accident.
My older brother is a teacher.
My brother is healthy.
My brother is an engineer.
My brother became an engineer.
My brother wants to study abroad.
My older brother wants to study abroad.
My brother likes music.
My brother has a taste for music.
My brother says he isn't afraid of the dark.
My brother is big enough to travel alone.
zh: 我哥已经够大，可以一个人去旅行了。

en: My brother is so smart and witty that I cannot beat him in an argument.
zh: 我哥太聪明机智了，辩论我根本说不过他。

en: My brother is so smart and witty that I can not beat him in an argument.
zh: 我哥脑子转得特别快，吵架我吵不过他。

en: My brother can run very fast.
My brother is good at playing tennis.
My brother doesn't go in for sports.
My brother smokes a great deal.
My brother became a cook.
My brother is very good at playing the guitar.
My brother plays the guitar.
My brother is now in Australia.
My brother's in Australia now.
zh: 我哥这会儿在澳大利亚。

en: My brother wants to go to the moon some day.
Both of my brothers are married.
My brother, being yet unmarried, did not keep house, but boarded himself and his apprentices in another family.
zh: 我哥那时候还没结婚，没成家，而是带着徒弟住在别人家吃住。

en: After graduating from college my brother went to the United States for the purpose of doing further research.
zh: 我哥大学毕业后去美国深造了。

en: My brother lives in a small village.
zh: 我哥住在一个小村子里。

en: My brother has many more good books than I do.
zh: 我哥的好书比我多得多。

en: My brother is working at a gas station.
Who is the woman talking to my brother sitting next to him?
zh: 坐在我哥旁边跟他说话那个女人是谁？

en: My brother's widow has married again.
If my brother hadn't saved me, I would've drowned.
zh: 要不是我哥救了我，我就淹死了。

en: If my brother hadn't helped me, I would've drowned.
zh: 要不是我哥帮我，我就淹死了。

en: My brother earns half as much money as my father.
zh: 我哥赚的钱只有我爸的一半。

en: He is my brother.
He's my older brother.
I as well as my brother am to blame.
My brother uses this bike.
zh: 这辆自行车是我哥在用。

en: My brother must be sick.
My socks are in need of mending.
How much will it cost to have my shoes repaired?
My shoes need polishing.
My shoes want repairing.
My shoes will have to be mended.
My shoes are old, but his are new.
zh: 我的鞋旧了，但他的还是新的。

en: My shoes won't bear wearing twice.
zh: 我的鞋再穿两次就得废了。

en: My shoes are the same size as his.
I can't find my shoes.
My shoes are gone.
Don't put your greedy hands on my money.
My muscles ached from playing tennis too much.
zh: 网球打多了，我肌肉酸疼。

en: Your achievements cannot be compared with mine.
My home town is adjacent to the ocean.
My interest quickened.
Joy and grief alternate in my breast.
My heart bounds with expectation.
You may as well know that I am a strict instructor.
zh: 你最好知道，我可是个很严的老师。

en: You should not have done it without my permission.
zh: 未经我允许，你不该这么做的。

en: You should not have done that without my approval.
zh: 没经过我同意，你不该干那件事。

en: Last year my income was about five million yen.
zh: 去年我的收入大概是500万日元。

en: My salary is 300,000 yen.
My salary doesn't allow us to live extravagantly.
zh: 靠我的工资，我们没法过奢侈的生活。

en: None of my classmates live near here.
zh: 我的同学里没人住这附近。

en: Some of my classmates like volleyball and the others enjoy tennis.
zh: 我同学里有的喜欢排球，有的喜欢网球。

en: My holiday plan has fallen through.
My legs still hurt.
In a sense, I am turning around the argument made by David Riesman in The Lonely Crowd.
zh: 从某种意义上说，我正在反转大卫·里斯曼在《孤独的人群》里提出的观点。

en: You can depend on my older sister-in-law to help you with your homework.
zh: 你可以找我嫂子帮你辅导作业。

en: My memory failed me. I just could not remember his name.
zh: 我记性不灵了，死活想不起他的名字。

en: My memory failed me. I just couldn't remember his name.
zh: 我记性不灵了，根本想不起他的名字。

en: It turned out that my memory was largely correct.
zh: 结果证明我的记忆基本没错。

en: My memory was at fault.
His behavior, as I remember, was very bad.
zh: 我记得他当时表现很差。

en: They are cousins, if I remember rightly.
zh: 如果我没记错的话，他们是堂兄弟。

en: My rule always was to do the business of the day in the day.
zh: 我的一贯准则是今日事今日毕。

en: My prayer was answered.
My feelings underwent a change.
It is not any different from what I expected.
zh: 跟我预想的没什么两样。

en: It isn't any different from what I expected.
My desk is made of wood.
My desk is old, but his is new.
zh: 我的书桌很旧，但他的是新的。

en: My desk is old.
My table is old.
The telephone on my desk rang persistently and loudly.
zh: 我桌上的电话大声响个不停。

en: There is an interesting book on my desk.
zh: 我桌上有一本挺有意思的书。

en: Don't lean on my desk.
Please interpret my strange dreams.
zh: 帮我解一下这些怪梦吧。

en: Can you do me a favor?
My wish is to study painting in Paris.
My wish is to conquer this mountain.
My prayers were answered.
Somebody's breathing on my face. It's disgusting.
zh: 有人对着我脸喘气，真恶心。

en: Have you seen my glasses anywhere?
zh: 你在哪儿看到过我的眼镜吗？

en: Where are my glasses?
I was cut to the quick by her remark.
The majority of my patients come to me from out of town.
zh: 我的病人大部分是从外地来的。

en: My patience is worn out.
Charge it to my account.
My bag is too old. I must buy a new one.
zh: 我的包太旧了，得买个新的。

en: My briefcase is full of papers.
zh: 我的公文包里装满了文件。

en: One of my pleasures is watching TV.
zh: 我的乐趣之一就是看电视。

en: My students are few in number, no more than five altogether.
zh: 我的学生很少，一共也就五个。

en: Since my school is large, I have to run to get from one classroom to another in a 5-minute break.
zh: 因为学校太大，五分钟课间我得用跑的才能赶到下个教室。

en: My school is about ten minutes' walk from the station.
zh: 从车站走去学校大约要十分钟。

en: There is a big park near my school.
zh: 我们学校附近有个大公园。

en: My school has a band.
As far as I can remember, it was three years ago that we last met.
zh: 如果没记错的话，我们上次见面是三年前。

en: My town is not what it used to be.
zh: 我们镇子跟以前大不一样了。

en: My town is by the sea.
My cough is getting worse.
She called while I was out.
zh: 我不在的时候她打过电话。

en: Any phone calls for me while I was out?
zh: 我不在的时候有人给我打电话吗？

en: Did anyone call me when I was out?
zh: 我出去的时候有人给我打电话吗？

en: My wish to go abroad is very strong.
zh: 我想出国的愿望很强烈。

en: At our company, the retirement age is 60.
zh: 我们公司的退休年龄是60岁。

en: I would be honored to give you a showing in my gallery.
zh: 我很荣幸能在我的画廊为您举办展览。

en: My patience gave out.
There are seven men and four women in my section.
zh: 我们科室有七个男的和四个女的。

en: Have you received my baggage?
What did you do with my baggage?
zh: 你把我的行李弄哪儿去了？

en: What did you do with my luggage?
zh: 你把我的行李怎么着了？

en: My luggage didn't arrive. What happened?
zh: 我的行李还没到，怎么回事？

en: My baggage is missing.
I can't find my luggage.
My suitcase is broken.
I think I can do it in my spare time.
zh: 我觉得我可以利用业余时间来做。

en: My family goes to Italy every year.
zh: 我们家每年都去意大利。

en: My family is a large one.
I have a large family.
Everyone in my family gets up early.
My family are all in good health.
My family are all very well.
Everyone in my family is very healthy.
zh: 我们家人身体都特别健康。

en: My family are all athletic.
zh: 我们家人都挺爱运动的。

en: My family is not very large.
My family is not all that large.
My family is not that large.
My family isn't such a big family.
zh: 我们家不是什么大家庭。

en: My family isn't that large.
My family isn't very large.
My family isn't all that large.
My family liked the dog very much.
zh: 我们家人以前特别喜欢那只狗。

en: My family have lived here for twenty years.
zh: 我们家在这儿住了二十年了。

en: My family has lived here for twenty years.
zh: 我们家在这儿住了二十年了。

en: My family always keep early hours.
zh: 我们家人一直早睡早起。

en: There are four members in my family.
Please see my people.
All are happy in my family.
My housework is to wash the dishes.
Did you have any difficulty in finding my house?
Come to my house.
Please drop by my home.
My house is built of wood.
My house is just across from the hospital.
My house seems small beside his.
zh: 和他的房子比起来，我家看起来挺小的。

en: My house faces to the south.
My house is near Tokyo Tower.
My house has a small yard.
My house is just across the street.
My house is designed so as to withstand an earthquake.
zh: 我家房子设计得能抗震。

en: My house is designed to withstand an earthquake.
zh: 我家房子设计得能抗震。

en: My house is close to the amenities of a big city.
zh: 我家离大城市的各种生活设施都很近。

en: My house is big.
My house is in the northern part of the city.
My house stands by a tall tree.
zh: 我家房子旁有一棵大树。

en: My house is in the suburbs.
My house is close to the park.
My house is very near the park.
My house is old and ugly.
My family is an old one.
My house, located on a hill, command a fine view.
My house faces the sea.
My house is near the station.
My house stands within easy access of the railroad station.
zh: 我家离火车站很近，交通很方便。

en: My house is conveniently close to the station.
zh: 我家离车站很近，挺方便的。

en: My house is only five minutes' walk from the station.
zh: 我家离车站走路只要五分钟。

en: My house is ten minutes' walk from the station.
zh: 我家离车站走路要十分钟。

en: My house is located at a distance from the station.
My house is within easy reach of the station.
My house is a mortgage-free house.
zh: 我的房子已经没有房贷了。

en: My house is close to a bus stop.
My house faces a busy street.
zh: 我家对着一条热闹的大街。

en: My house always shakes when a truck goes by.
zh: 只要有大卡车经过，我家房子就会晃。

en: My house is on the south bank of the Thames.
My house is a little way from the street.
zh: 我家离马路有一小段距离。

en: My house is on the outskirts of town.
My house is on the skirts of the town.
My house is a long way from here.
My house is comprised of these four rooms.
My house is five blocks away.
My home is in the country.
My house is beyond that bridge.
My home is on the eighth floor.
My house is a two-story affair.
My house is like yours.
A tall building was built next to my house.
zh: 我家旁边盖了一栋高楼。

en: There is a small pond in back of my house.
There is a lake in front of my house.
There used to be a vegetable garden in our yard.
zh: 我们家院子里以前有个菜园。

en: There is a post office in front of my house.
There is a bookstore in front of my house.
There is a shop in front of my house.
There is a tall tree in front of my house.
There is a park in front of my house.
A new building is being built in front of my house.
zh: 我家门前正在盖一栋新楼。

en: There is a cherry tree in front of my house.
zh: 我家门前有一棵樱花树。

en: It became quiet on top of my house.
My house is backed by woods.
There's a church behind my house.
A small stream runs by my house.
There is a beautiful park near my home.
zh: 我家附近有个漂亮的公园。

en: There is a broad street near my house.
zh: 我家附近有一条很宽的马路。

en: There is a park near my house.
There is a school near my house.
There are some shops near my house.
There is not a store near my house.
There is a fine park near my house.
zh: 我家附近有个挺不错的公园。

en: There is an apartment house near my house.
zh: 我家附近有一栋公寓楼。

en: The roof of my house is red.
When you can come to my house, please call me first.
zh: 你来我家之前，请先给我打个电话。

en: Please come to my house.
Come over!
Why don't you come to my house and play the piano?
zh: 你要不来我家弹钢琴吧？

en: My house is fully insured.
zh: 我家房子的保险买全了。

en: My house is covered by insurance.
There is little furniture in my house.
There isn't much furniture in my house.
It's true that a ghost appeared at my house.
If you come to my house, I will tell you the story in detail.
zh: 你来我家的话，我再详细给你讲讲那个故事。

en: My family is under the control of my mother.
Even if my house catches fire it would soon be put out.
zh: 就算我家着火了，也能很快扑灭。

en: It is not far from my house to the station.
It isn't far from my house to the station.
How long does it take you to go home from my house?
The hill on which my house stands commands a full view of the city.
zh: 我家在山上，可以俯瞰全城。

en: My summer vacation is at an end.
Do you have any messages for me?
I can't find my vanity case.
zh: 我找不到我的化妆包了。

en: There were no clerks to wait on me.
My speech was greeted with cold silence.
zh: 我的发言换来了一片沉默。

en: I assure you of my support.
My English is anything but good.
My English is not good at all.
My English teacher advised me to read these books.
zh: 我的英语老师建议我读读这些书。

en: Will you help me with my English homework?
zh: 你能帮我做一下英语作业吗？

en: My driver's license will expire next week.
As for that soup, it was so hot I really couldn't drink it.
zh: 那碗汤太烫了，我根本没法喝。

en: The soup I had was so hot I couldn't drink it.
zh: 我喝的那碗汤太烫了，没法喝。

en: What impressed me was the blue sky.
zh: 让我印象最深的是那蓝蓝的天空。

en: My oldest brother is single.
My oldest brother attended the meeting on behalf of our father.
zh: 我大哥代表我爸去参加了会议。

en: My favorite pastime is strolling along the shore.
zh: 我最喜欢的消遣就是去海边散散步。

en: The better half of my life is gone.
zh: 我这辈子最好的时光已经过去了。

en: Don't lean on my chair.
My intentions reached you clearly enough.
zh: 我的意思你应该已经听得很明白了。

en: I have a couple of pieces of evidence to support my opinion.
zh: 我有几个证据能支持我的观点。

en: I cannot tell my opinion without provoking him.
zh: 我只要一说出我的想法准会惹他不高兴。

en: My opinions are similar to his.
My opinion differs from his.
My opinion is similar to yours.
My opinion is on the whole the same as yours.
zh: 总的来说，我的看法和你一致。

en: I think otherwise.
My opinion doesn't count for much at the office.
zh: 在公司里，我的意见没什么分量。

en: My opinion is somewhat conservative.
My opinion is different from yours.
My opinion is a little different from yours.
zh: 我的看法和你有点小分歧。

en: My opinion differs widely from yours.
zh: 我的看法和你大不相同。

en: My opinion differs from most of the other students in my class.
zh: 我的看法和班里大多数同学都不一样。

en: In my opinion, it's quite unsuitable.
In my opinion, staying up late is bad for one's health.
zh: 我觉得熬夜对身体不好。

en: In my opinion, staying up late is bad for your health.
zh: 我觉得熬夜对你身体不好。

en: In my opinion, he's the right man for the job.
zh: 我看他挺适合这份工作的。

en: In my opinion, he is not fit for the work.
zh: 我觉得他不适合这份工作。

en: In my opinion, we should pay more attention to the present state of affairs.
zh: 我觉得我们应该多关注一下现状。

en: In my opinion, it would be difficult to solve this problem.
zh: 我觉得这问题挺难解决的。

en: In my opinion, alcohol is not necessarily bad for your health.
zh: 我觉得喝酒不一定对身体不好。

en: My comment sparked off an argument in the group.
zh: 我的评论在群里引起了争论。

en: From my position, I cannot see the tower.
zh: 从我这个位置看不见那座塔。

en: My dear little cat has been missing for a week.
zh: 我心爱的小猫已经丢了一个星期了。

en: My love for my dog was very deep.
zh: 我对我家狗的感情很深。

en: I do things at my own pace.
My robot will prepare meals, clean, wash dishes, and perform other household tasks.
zh: 我的机器人会做饭、打扫、洗碗，还会做其他家务。

en: My robot's name is Multi.
My robot's name is Maruchi.
Will you look over my report?
zh: 你能帮我看看我的报告吗？

en: Would you please look over my report?
zh: 能麻烦你帮我过一下我的报告吗？

en: Take my apples, boy, and sell them in the city.
zh: 孩子，拿上我的苹果去城里卖了吧。

en: My apples are gone.
My radio has broken down again.
Do it your own way if you don't like my way.
zh: 如果你不喜欢我的方式，就按你自己的来。

en: Please leave my things as they are.
zh: 请让我的东西保持原样。

en: My hens laid fewer eggs last year.
zh: 去年我的母鸡下的蛋变少了。

en: Get me my glasses.
Bring me my glasses.
This is my email address.
Here's my email address.
Here is my email address.
zh: 这是我的电子邮箱地址。

en: My niece is attractive and mature for her age.
zh: 我侄女长得挺漂亮，而且比同龄人成熟。

en: My host family gave me a hearty welcome.
zh: 我的寄宿家庭非常热情地欢迎了我。

en: It happened that there was a hole in my pocket.
Everybody was singing except me.
Three of my friends, besides me, were admitted to the bar.
zh: 除了我，我还有三个朋友也获得了律师资格。

en: My boyfriend is smart, handsome, and friendly too.
zh: 我男朋友又聪明又帅，还很随和。

en: My boyfriend seems serious.
zh: 我男朋友看起来挺严肃的。

en: I'm about ready to go.
I, for my part, don't care.
There are no faults on my part.
You may use my pen.
Don't use my pen.
My pen must be looked for.
I have to find my pen.
I need to search for my pen.
I have to look for my pen.
My pen is old. I want a new one.
zh: 我的笔旧了，我想换支新的。

en: My pen is very easy to write.
You may use my pen at any time.
Who is it that is sleeping on my bed?
My business is picking up again.
My beard grows quickly.
The price of my piano lessons includes the use of the piano.
zh: 我钢琴课的学费包括了练琴的费用。

en: I've mine right here in my hand.
What did you do with my purse?
My punch sent him reeling into the rope.
zh: 我一拳把他打得踉跄着撞到了围绳上。

en: My punch sent him reeling.
zh: 我一拳把他打得踉踉跄跄。

en: I can't find my bag.
Something was wrong with my computer and I couldn't get on-line.
zh: 我电脑出了点问题，上不了网。

en: What do you make of my pie?
zh: 你觉得我做的派怎么样？

en: You can have a ride on my motorcycle.
Would you like to come to my party?
zh: 你想来参加我的派对吗？

en: Will you please come to my party?
zh: 你能来参加我的派对吗？

en: A girl opened the door in answer to my knock.
zh: 我敲了敲门，一个女孩过来开了门。

en: Bring my notebook back to me, please.
zh: 请把我的笔记本还给我。

en: My notebook is in the desk.
My knife has such a fine edge.
Please drop by and see me.
My harsh words bruised her feeling.
zh: 我那番狠话伤了她的心。

en: My watch needs mending.
My clock needs to be fixed.
My watch doesn't keep good time.
My knowledge of German is poor.
My TV set is almost 15 years old, but it still has a good picture.
zh: 我这电视都快十五年了，画面还挺清楚的。

en: My tennis hasn't improved in the slightest.
zh: 我的网球水平一点都没长进。

en: I like playing tennis, though I'm not very good at it.
zh: 我挺喜欢打网球的，虽然打得不怎么样。

en: This is all I can do.
All I can do is to work silently.
zh: 我能做的只有默默工作。

en: My tape recorder is compatible with your amplifier.
zh: 我的录音机和你的功放是兼容的。

en: My duty is always before me.
zh: 我时刻记着自己的职责。

en: Would you mind calling him for me?
zh: 能麻烦你帮我给他打个电话吗？

en: Don't put off your departure on account of me.
zh: 别因为我耽误了你出发。

en: Please don't take any trouble on my account.
Don't wait on my account.
I appreciate your graciousness and efforts on my behalf.
zh: 非常感谢你为我付出的心意和努力。

en: I can't find my duffel bag.
zh: 我找不到我的行李袋了。

en: You might ask before you use my typewriter.
zh: 你用我的打字机之前，先跟我说一声啊。

en: Something is wrong with my typewriter.
Keep your hands off my typewriter.
Sit beside me.
Will you help me with this?
My socks aren't here.
All of my strength gave out.
My stereo set is inferior to yours in sound quality.
zh: 我这音响音质没你的好。

en: My skirt is too long.
I can't find my suitcase.
zh: 我找不到我的手提箱了。

en: Please keep an eye on my suitcase.
My shirt isn't dry yet.
What shirt size should I have?
My jacket is not the same as yours.
zh: 我的夹克跟你的不一样。

en: My jacket isn't the same as yours.
zh: 我的夹克跟你的不一样。

en: My jeans shrank in the wash.
I'm looking for a coat in my size.
zh: 我想找一件我这个尺寸的大衣。

en: As compared with his, my collection is nothing.
zh: 跟他的比起来，我的收藏根本不算什么。

en: The cloth absorbed the ink I had spilled.
zh: 那块布把我洒的墨水都吸干了。

en: These clothes of mine are out of style.
Do you remember me?
Please don't laugh at me.
Please don't misunderstand me.
Whatever you say about me, say it to my face, not behind my back.
zh: 不管你怎么说我，都当面说，别在背后说。

en: Some people think I'm weak-willed.
zh: 有些人觉得我意志力薄弱。

en: Don't trouble about me.
Please note my words.
Let me alone.
"Leave me alone," she said angrily.
Don't bother yourself about me.
He doesn't care a bit about me.
I don't think I really matter to you.
zh: 我觉得我对你其实并不重要。

en: Don't have any worries on my account.
There was a message for me, wasn't there?
I found my glass in pieces.
Don't put sugar in my coffee.
My overcoat is light but warm.
zh: 我的大衣很轻，但很暖和。

en: My coat has finally worn out.
There's a hole in my coat.
My coach said, "Failure teaches success."
zh: 我教练说：“失败是成功之母。”

en: All my class are hardworking.
zh: 我们班的同学都很勤奋。

en: Everybody in my class prefers skiing to skating.
zh: 我们班的所有人都比起滑冰更喜欢滑雪。

en: All the students in my class are friendly.
zh: 我们班的学生都很友好。

en: Half of my class like dogs.
zh: 我们班有一半人喜欢狗。

en: All the girls in my class are kind.
zh: 我们班的女生都很善良。

en: My class is made up of forty students.
zh: 我们班由四十名学生组成。

en: There are 40 students in my class.
My camera is waterproof.
My camera doesn't need to be fixed.
My camera is the same as your camera.
zh: 我的相机跟你的一模一样。

en: My camera loads easily.
zh: 我的相机装胶卷很方便。

en: My camera is a Nikon.
My camera is different from yours.
zh: 我的相机和你的不一样。

en: My camera is much better than yours.
zh: 我的相机比你的好多了。

en: Something's wrong with my camera.
My camera was stolen.
What have you done with my bag?
There is no money in my bag.
My canary was killed by a cat.
zh: 我的金丝雀被猫咬死了。

en: My basket is under the table.
My girlfriend is a good dancer.
I can't find my garment bag.
zh: 我找不到我的西装袋了。

en: Charge this to my account.
My mother is beautiful.
My mother said if I eloped, she would never forgive me.
zh: 我妈说如果我私奔了，她永远都不会原谅我。

en: My father is very nice.
My big sister washes her hair every morning.
zh: 我姐姐每天早上都洗头。

en: Didn't I give you some money?
My favorite flavor is chocolate.
zh: 我最喜欢的口味是巧克力。

en: My aunt inherited the huge estate.
zh: 我阿姨继承了一大笔遗产。

en: My aunt grows tomatoes in her garden.
zh: 我阿姨在花园里种西红柿。

en: My aunt gave me a book for Christmas.
zh: 圣诞节阿姨送了我一本书。

en: My aunt is coming to Tokyo tomorrow.
My grandmother was a farmer.
My grandma bent over to pick up a needle and thread.
My uncle engaged himself in teaching cooking.
zh: 我叔以前一直忙着教人做饭。

en: My uncle's job was teaching cooking.
zh: 我叔以前的工作是教人做饭。

en: My uncle teaches English in a college.
My uncle has seen a lot of life.
My uncle manages a firm.
My uncle asked me to take care of the chickens.
zh: 我叔让我帮他看那些鸡。

en: My uncle died of cancer of the stomach yesterday.
zh: 我叔昨天因为胃癌去世了。

en: My uncle keeps a dog.
My uncle lives in London.
My uncle has a good knowledge of French.
My uncle lives in an apartment.
My uncle drives a Ford.
My uncle comes to see me from time to time.
My uncle works in this office.
zh: 我叔在这个办公室上班。

en: My uncle is an amateur cricket player.
zh: 我叔是个业余板球运动员。

en: My uncle calls on me every three days.
zh: 我叔每隔三天就来看我一次。

en: My uncle, who lives in Paris, came to see us.
zh: 我那住在巴黎的叔叔来看我们了。

en: My uncle was standing there with his arms folded.
zh: 我叔双手抱胸站在那儿。

en: My uncle lived to be ninety.
My uncle lives in the east of Spain.
My uncle gave him a present.
I wish my uncles were men of millions.
zh: 真希望我的叔叔们都是亿万富翁。

en: My uncle has been dead for three years.
It is this watch that my uncle gave me as a keepsake.
zh: 这块表是我叔给我留作纪念的。

en: It has been ten years since my uncle went to Canada.
zh: 我叔去加拿大已经十年了。

en: My grandfather is a carpenter.
My grandfather gets up early.
My grandfather hopes that I will enter college.
zh: 我爷爷希望我能考上大学。

en: My grandpa is a lively and good-humoured man.
zh: 我爷爷这人挺开朗，也有幽默感。

en: My motorcycle broke down on the way.
zh: 我的摩托车在半路坏了。

en: My nephew is allergic to eggs.
My nephew was excused on the grounds of his youth.
zh: 我侄子因为年纪小被原谅了。

en: My nephew was excused because of his youth.
zh: 我侄子因为年纪还小被免予追究。

en: My family is small.
Will you read my essay and correct the mistakes, if any?
zh: 能帮我看看作文，有错的话帮我改一下吗？

en: My father and I clear the table in my family.
zh: 我家里是我和我爸负责收桌子。

en: We call him Goro-san.
Visit my webpage and find out more about me.
zh: 逛逛我的网页，多了解了解我。

en: Apparently my anti-virus software is not up to snuff.
zh: 看来我的杀毒软件不太给力啊。

en: There will be a reward for the person who finds my dog.
zh: 谁要是能找回我的狗，必有重谢。

en: Who was it that read my diary while I was out?
zh: 谁趁我不在偷看我日记了？

en: My cousin is the last person to break his promise.
zh: 我表哥最讲信用了，绝不会食言。

en: My cousin isn't the kind of person who'd ever break a promise.
zh: 我表哥不是那种会说话不算数的人。

en: My cousin is good at doing magic tricks.
My cousin was familiar with trouble when he was young.
zh: 我表哥小时候没少惹麻烦。

en: My cousin is a little older than I.
My cousin is a little older than I am.
zh: 我表哥比我大那么一点点。

en: My cousin, who is a lawyer, is in France at present.
zh: 我那个当律师的表哥现在在法国。

en: One of my cousins is married to a novelist.
zh: 我的一个表亲嫁给了一个小说家。

en: I want you to meet my cousin.
zh: 我想介绍我表哥给你认识。

en: The building was still there in my time.
zh: 我那时候那栋楼还在呢。

en: My house looks to the south.
Keep my words in mind.
I'll show my album to you.
My American classes are more informal.
zh: 我在美国上的课氛围比较轻松随性。

en: My apartment is located within five minutes' walk of the station.
zh: 我住的地方离车站走路不到五分钟。

en: My apartment gets plenty of sunshine.
My anorak, such as it was, stood me in good stead.
zh: 我那件大衣虽然一般，但那时候还真帮了我大忙。

en: Please take my advice.
My e-mail address has been changed as follows.
zh: 我的邮箱地址改成下面这个了。

en: My e-mail address will be changed effective Aug. 1 as follows.
zh: 从8月1号起，我的邮箱地址将改为如下。

en: My e-mail address will be as follows effective April 1.
zh: 从4月1号起，我的邮箱地址如下。

en: My e-mail address has been changed.
I'm afraid you must have misinterpreted my e-mail of Jun 8.
zh: 我想你可能是误解了我6月8号发的那封邮件。

en: My sixty-year-old aunt inherited the huge estate.
zh: 我那个六十岁的姑姑继承了一大笔遗产。

en: This has been the most awful day in my eleven-year-old life.
zh: 这是我十一岁的人生里最糟糕的一天。

en: Will you tell me?
The boy who spoke to me was a new student.
zh: 刚才跟我说话的那个男生是新生。

en: You can get hold of me at the Yasesu Hotel.
zh: 你可以去八重洲饭店找我。

en: A good idea struck me.
zh: 我突然想到了一个好主意。

en: I have no family to provide for.
Ring the bell when you want me.
Speak in my behalf.
It is a lot of fun to read his letter sent to me every month.
zh: 读他每个月寄给我的信挺有意思的。

en: I wish I could use magic.
You may as well tell me the truth.
Please let me know the truth.
I'll stay here if you really want me to.
zh: 如果你真想让我留下来，那我就待在这。

en: She was a bit hasty in answering me.
zh: 她回我的话回得有点仓促。

en: My father has a lot of books.
The girl who gave me beautiful flowers was your sister.
zh: 送我那些漂亮花儿的女孩是你姐姐。

en: Give me a blank sheet of paper.
Let me handle it.
Leave it up to me.
Don't yell at me.
I'll leave my number in case you want to call me.
zh: 我留个号码，万一你想找我呢。

en: Have there been any phone calls for me?
Let me know by telephone.
Please give me a call.
He threw mud at me and made me dirty.
zh: 他往我身上扔泥巴，把我弄脏了。

en: Will you make me a paper crane?
You can't expect me to make no misspellings at all.
zh: 你不能指望我一个字母都不拼错。

en: Will you draw me a map to show me the way to the station?
zh: 能给我画张去车站的地图吗？

en: As far as I know, he is American.
Have you got 5,000 yen you could lend me?
zh: 你有五千日元能借我吗？

en: Do you have 5,000 yen you could lend me?
zh: 你手头有五千日元可以借我吗？

en: I couldn't find a clerk to wait on me.
His anger towards me has not softened.
I don't like the way he speaks to me.
zh: 我不喜欢他跟我说话的那种语气。

en: Follow me and do exactly the way I do it.
zh: 跟着我，照着我的样子做。

en: You are barking up the wrong tree by asking me to betray my country.
zh: 让我背叛祖国，你真是找错人了。

en: I'm going to have a baby.
It is very kind of you to give me your seat.
Give me some water, please.
Bring me a glass of water.
A new room was assigned to me.
Could you spare me a little time?
Give me a few.
It is wise of you to ask me for advice.
zh: 找我拿主意你算是找对人了。

en: I'll help you within the limits of my ability.
I am pleased to help you if I can.
zh: 如果能帮到你，我很高兴。

en: All I can do is to give her advice.
zh: 我能做的就是给她提点建议。

en: Teach judo to me.
Follow me.
Let me repair it.
My hobby is skiing.
I'm willing to help you if you want me to.
zh: 如果你需要，我很乐意帮忙。

en: Do you wish me to help?
Please write a letter to me.
The man who is waving to me is my uncle.
zh: 那个冲我招手的人是我叔叔。

en: Let me fix the car.
Yesterday I had my bicycle stolen.
My bike was stolen yesterday.
She asked me to bring them.
zh: 她让我把那些东西带过来。

en: Do you think it looks good on me?
zh: 你觉得我穿这个好看吗？

en: Let me know your exam results.
zh: 成绩出来了告诉我一声。

en: Let me know what you got on your exam.
zh: 考了多少分告诉我一下。

en: Give me a sheet of paper.
My sister got engaged.
My older sister got engaged.
My job will only last two years at most.
zh: 我的工作最多也就干两年。

en: Let me help you with your work.
Please allow me to go.
Please let me go.
I saw a man coming toward me.
zh: 我看到一个男人朝我走过来。

en: Don't answer me back.
He acted fairly towards me.
I think they sold you a bad article if ask me.
zh: 要我说，我觉得他们卖给你的是个次品。

en: If you ask me, she's a little unusual.
You might have told me.
It was her that told me.
I wish I had wings to fly.
zh: 真希望我有一双能飞的翅膀。

en: It is no use asking me for money.
This aroused my fears.
Please explain the rule to me.
He did it unbeknownst to me.
As far as I'm concerned, I have no complaint.
zh: 对我来说，我没什么可抱怨的。

en: As far as I am concerned, I have nothing to say.
zh: 对我来说，我没什么可说的。

en: As far as I am concerned, I am not against your opinion.
zh: 对我来说，我不反对你的意见。

en: So far as I am concerned there is no objection.
zh: 对我而言，我没什么异议。

en: As for me, I can't agree to his offer.
zh: 对我来说，我没法接受他的提议。

en: That's all right, so far as I'm concerned.
As far as I am concerned, everything is all right.
zh: 就我看来，一切都挺好的。

en: As far as I am concerned I can leave today.
zh: 对我来说，我今天走也行。

en: As for me, I don't trust him at all.
zh: 对我来说，我一点都不相信他。

en: As far as I'm concerned, you can do what you like.
zh: 对我来说，你想干什么都行。

en: So far as I am concerned, you may leave whenever you like.
zh: 对我来说，你随时可以走。

en: As far as I am concerned, I have no objection.
That's all right as far as I am concerned.
As far as I am concerned, the problem is not a simple one.
zh: 在我看来，这个问题不简单。

en: As far as I am concerned the question is not simple.
zh: 对我来说，这问题没那么简单。

en: As far as I am concerned, I have no objection to the plan.
zh: 对我来说，我不反对这个计划。

en: As far as I'm concerned, I have no objection to the plan.
zh: 就我而言，我并不反对这个计划。

en: So far as I am concerned, there is no objection to the plan.
zh: 对我而言，这个计划没什么问题。

en: So far as I am concerned, I am not against his plan.
zh: 对我来说，我不反对他的计划。

en: As for me, I prefer fish to meat.
zh: 对我来说，比起肉我更喜欢鱼。

en: As for myself, Saturday will be convenient.
zh: 对我来说，周六挺方便的。

en: As for me, I prefer coffee to tea.
zh: 我个人的话，比起茶更喜欢咖啡。

en: As for me, I have no question.
As for me, I have nothing against the plan.
zh: 对我来说，我不反对这个计划。

en: As to me, I agree to the plan.
As for me, I prefer beer to whisky.
zh: 对我来说，比起威士忌我更喜欢啤酒。

en: As far as I'm concerned, things are going well.
zh: 就我看来，一切进展顺利。

en: All is well with me.
As for me, I am not satisfied with the result of the examination the other day.
zh: 对我来说，我不满意前几天考试的结果。

en: I am responsible for the mistake.
It's a bit much to expect me to pay the bill.
zh: 让我买单有点过分了吧。

en: In all honesty, I could not say the room allotted to me was comfortable.
zh: 说实话，我觉得分给我的房间并不舒服。

en: It is very kind of you to come and see me.
zh: 你能来看我真是太有心了。

en: It's no use telling me anything.
What did you expect me to do?
Don't talk to me!
Give me something cold to drink.
Guess what happened to me.
Can I do anything?
How could I resist?
She raised her fist as if to hit me.
zh: 她举起拳头，像是要打我。

en: Could you direct me to the station?
Please teach me English.
Don't lie to me.
Let me say it once for all.
Let me say this just once.
It is polite of this boy to greet me.
zh: 这孩子跟我打招呼，挺有礼貌的。

en: As far as I could make out, he was experimenting with new methods.
zh: 据我观察，他是在尝试新方法。

en: The boy I helped is Tony.
zh: 我帮过的那个男孩是托尼。

en: Can you recommend a good dictionary to me?
zh: 能推荐个好词典给我吗？

en: Let me have a try.
